data.text:
LFM Radio is New Zealand's Hit Music & Dance Radio station. Broadcasting on FM 88.2 Whitianga and FM 107.5 Taupo and online at http://www.lfmonline.co.nz.

â¢ Official site: http://www.lfmonline.co.nz

â¢ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/lfmnz

> If you intend to use the app over a cellular network you may incur significant data charges. An unlimited data plan is recommended.

Radio App Features:

â¢ Directly control your music player from a locked screen.

â¢ Easily add tracks to your favourite by simply clicking the Â«heartÂ» icon.

â¢ Locate and listen to missed tracks through your personal listening history.

â¢ Share and favourite the track thatâs currently playing by just swiping down and tapping.

â¢ Get all latest news from social networks.

â¢ View images that the have been posted in social networks and access the mobile version of the post directly in the app.

â¢ Push messages from broadcaster.

â¢ AirPlay â enjoy your favorite mediastream via AirPlay.

â¢ About screen: recommend the App via Twitter/Email, write to developer.
